landing.heroTitle: the free, fun, and effective way to master chess!
landing.heroSubtitle: Learn chess with AI-powered lessons, puzzles, and personalized coaching.

whyWorks.title: why chesster works
whyWorks.subtitle: Our scientifically-proven methods help you learn chess faster and retain knowledge longer.
whyWorks.effectiveDesc: Our lessons are designed by chess masters and backed by learning science. You'll see real improvement in your game.
whyWorks.funEngagingDesc: Earn XP, unlock achievements, and compete with friends. Learning chess has never been this enjoyable.
whyWorks.personalizedDesc: AI adapts to your skill level and learning style. Every lesson is tailored specifically for you.
whyWorks.freeDesc: Access all core features for free. Premium is optional and only for those who want extra perks.

howItWorks.title: start learning in minutes
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up in seconds. No credit card required. Start your chess journey immediately.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our AI evaluates your current skill level to personalize your learning path.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Complete bite-sized lessons, solve puzzles, and track your progress. Just 15 minutes a day!

explore.title: explore chesster
explore.coursesDesc: Structured lessons from beginner to master
explore.puzzlesDesc: Sharpen your tactics with daily challenges
explore.analysisDesc: Deep dive into any position with AI
explore.gameReviewDesc: Learn from your games with AI feedback

testimonials.title: loved by chess players
testimonials.quote1: I went from 800 to 1400 rating in just 3 months!
testimonials.quote2: The AI tutor explains concepts better than any book I've read.
testimonials.quote3: Finally, a chess app that makes learning fun and not intimidating.

cta.title: ready to become a chess master?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of learners and start your journey today. It's free!

footer.tagline: The free, fun, and effective way to learn chess.

dashboard.analysisToolsSubtitle: Powerful AI-powered tools to analyze positions, games, and solve puzzles
dashboard.positionAnalysisDesc: Analyze any chess position with Stockfish engine and AI coaching
dashboard.gameAnalysisDesc: Upload and analyze your complete games with detailed insights
dashboard.chessPuzzlesDesc: Solve tactical puzzles to improve your calculation skills
dashboard.learningJourneySubtitle: Structured courses with AI tutoring to master chess fundamentals
dashboard.checkBack: Check back soon for new content!
